column3: Last year I wrote a statistical analysis of how to win solo queue draft: https://www.itero.gg/articles/draft-sq
The most important factor came out as Champion Mastery, so I wrote this follow-up statistical analysis of Mastery:
This sheet contains the raw values which produced a number of tables from the article, split into two tabs:
Easiest to Learn: The Champion's which have the lowest decrease in their win rate when played by someone with low Mastery (<10K)
Best to Master: The Champion's which gain the most win rate when player by someone with high Mastery (+100K)
3. In the top bar, click "Data" > "Filter views" > "Create new filter view"
4.  Filter or Sort the table by clicking the icon
Roughly equal mix of EUW, NA & KR
Around Gold elo (some high Silver, some low Plat)
Jack J (MSc), Data Scientist @ iTero Gaming
